dict.acceptation: 眼睛；视力；眼状物；风纪扣扣眼；
定睛地看；注视；审视；细看；

sent.orig: To eye is a denominative verb.
sent.trans: “to eye”中的eye是来自名词的动词。

sent.orig: Use methyl cellulose eye drops eye drops-examination of the eye moist.
sent.trans: 可采用甲基纤维素滴眼液、考的松滴眼液维持眼部的湿润。

sent.orig: Dry eye syndrome is one of the most common problems treated eye physicians.
sent.trans: 干眼综合征是最常见的眼科疾患之一。

sent.orig: POPULISTS and professors rarely see eye to eye.
sent.trans: 平民主义者与教授很少有意见一致的时候。

sent.orig: The entrepreneur of eye avant-courier has been her lock surely in eye shot.
sent.trans: 眼光前卫的企业家已经将她锁定在视野之中。
